alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:07PM CST until December 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Areas of freezing drizzle and locally dense fog will result in some additional minor ice accumulation the rest of the afternoon. Untreated and elevated surfaces will be most susceptible to the slick conditions. Fog may also reduce visibility to less than one half mile for short durations in some areas. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Through 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially across south central Nebraska where temperatures are less likely to reach 32 degrees. The late afternoon commute will be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
